name: Dino Savior
description:
Initially submitted for the Mini Jam 88.
Note: Due to personal time constraints, initial submission does not include audio*.
Total time ended up around 8 hours put in.
*Audio was added in after submission time had passed.

The sky is falling! Catch as many eggs as you can before the dreaded meteor hits!

Controls:
WASD to move
R to restart

Credits:
Main theme by Matthew Pablo
www.matthewpablo.com

End theme
syncopika
